O

onAddAppointmentBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the add appointment button is pressed, there is a check to make sure that there are no empty fields, there are no overlapping appointments, and the appointment being scheduled is within business hours.
onAddCustomerBackBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
Cancels the current action and returns to the main screen.
onAddCustomerBtn() - Method in class controller.CustomerController
Adds a new customer when the add button is pressed and there are no blank fields.
onAllAppointmentRadioBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the all button is pressed the application will show all appointments on the table view.
onAppointmentsByTypeMonth() - Method in class controller.ReportController
When the tab for selecting reports by type and month is selected, the table view will populate all appointment types with a total and all appointments by month and the total number of appointments for that month.
onBackModifyAppointmentBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
Displays a message confirming that the user would like to exit the current screen and go back to the main screen.
onBackModifyAppointmentBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
Cancels modifying the selected appointment and returns to the appointment screen.
onCancelLoginBtn() - Method in class controller.LoginController
If the user does not want to log in they press the cancel button and are taken back to the main screen.
onClearAppointmentBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the clear button is pressed it clears all the input from the text fields and combo boxes.
onContactReportsSelection() - Method in class controller.ReportController
When the tab for selecting reports by contact is selected, the table view will populate all appointments associated with the selected contact and the total number of appointments per contact.
onDeleteAppointmentBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the cancel button is pressed, there will be a message that lets the user know that they are about to cancel an existing appointment when a given appointment ID and type.
onDeleteModifyCustomerBtn() - Method in class controller.CustomerController
Deletes the selected customer and displays a confirmation message with the ID and name of the customer.
onFirstScreenAppointmentBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Takes the user to the appointment view.
onFirstScreenCustomerBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Takes the user to the customer view.
onFirstScreenExitBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Takes the user back to the login screen.
onFirstScreenReportsBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Takes the user to the report view.
onLoginBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginController
Checks to see if the logged on user has an appointment in the next 15 minutes.
onModifyAppointmentBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the modify button is pressed it sends the information of the selected appointment to modify controller.
onModifyAppointmentBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
Modifies the selected appointment when the modify button is pressed and no text fields and combo boxes are empty.
onModifyCustomerBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerController
Sends the selected customer's information to the modify controller for modification.
onModifyCustomerCancelBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
Cancels the modify action and returns the user back to the customer screen.
onModifyCustomerClearButton() - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
When the clear button is pressed it clears all the text fields and combo boxes.
onModifyCustomerSaveBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
Saves the modified customer if there are no empty fields and sends the user back to the customer view.
onModifyDeleteButton() - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
Deletes the selected customer and displays the customer ID and name to be deleted for confirmation.
onMonthlyAppointmentRadioBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the monthly button is pressed the application will only show appointments with the current month and disables the other buttons.
onReportBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportController
Cancels the current action and redirects the user to the main screen.
onUserReportsSelection() - Method in class controller.ReportController
When the tab for selecting reports by user is selected, the table view will populate all appointments by user ID and the total number of appointments per user.
onWeeklyAppointmentRadioBtn() - Method in class controller.AppointmentController
When the weekly button is pressed the application will only show appointments with the current week and disables the other buttons.
